metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41816 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: CGI.escape_html in Ruby before 2.7.5 and 3.x before 3.0.3 has an integeroverflow and resultant buffer overflow via a long string on platforms (suchas Windows) where size_t and long have different numbers of bytes. Thisalso affects the CGI gem before 0.3.1 for Ruby.

criterions.comment: ruby2.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
